title: Cubs Solly Hofman and/or Jimmy Sheckard
author: TheBigRedOne

posts.post_title: Cubs Solly Hofman and/or Jimmy Sheckard
posts.post_content:
Looking for a 1.5 to 3 grade Hofman or Sheckard, any back to fill out the common cards from the t206 Cubs.  Prefer not to spend a fortune on these cards.  eBay has been crazy on a few of cards as of late.

Can do PayPal or other payment methods....
